Uses of Class
neuralNetwork.Perceptron

Packages that use Perceptron
neuralNetwork Provides the basic abstract classes and interfaces for a feed-forward neural network. 
neuralNetwork.neuralNetworkStructures A package of FeedForwardNNs with different topographies. 
neuralNetwork.perceptrons A package of Perceptrons with different activation functions.
